trans-unit.source: Represents a column of a table or view in the data store accessed through a data connection.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kolonne i en tabell eller visning i datakilden som er tilgjengelig via en datatilkobling.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataColumn class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerDataColumn er én av flere typer som representerer skjemaet for et datalager under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: Disse elementene skjemaet er gjort tilgjengelig for kontroller av utviklere implementering av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer tilgang til skjemaobjekter ved å ringe det <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>-metoden til grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified name and data type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"> </xref> klassen med den angitte navn og data.

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av DesignerDataColumn til å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre egenskapene er angitt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Navn som identifiserer kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified name, data type, and default value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"> </xref> klassen med angitt navn, datatype og standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn constructor to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren DesignerDataColumn til å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A>, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre egenskapene er angitt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Navn som identifiserer kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the column.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn"> </xref> klassen med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerDataColumn constructor to set all the properties of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konstruktøren DesignerDataColumn til å angi alle egenskaper for en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn>objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataColumn>

trans-unit.source: The name identifying the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Navn som identifiserer kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the column
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for kolonnen

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field is the identity field of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet er Identitetsfeltet for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet kan være null i datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the field is the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feltet er primærnøkkel for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits used by a numeric data field.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall sifre som brukes av en numerisk datafelt.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric data field.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet sifre til høyre for desimaltegnet i numeriske data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: The length of the data field, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på datafeltet i byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data type of the data column.
trans-unit.target: Henter datatypen for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the data column.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardverdien for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the data column.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data column is an identity column for the data row.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnen er en identitetskolonne for dataraden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> of the column is an identity column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kolonnen er en identitetskolonne; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the data column.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden i byte av kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The length of the data column, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på kolonnen, i byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column can be null in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnen kan være null i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnen kan være null i datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of digits in a numeric data column.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall sifre i en kolonne med numeriske data.

trans-unit.source: The number of digits in a numeric data column.
trans-unit.target: Antall sifre i en kolonne med numeriske data.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the column is part of the table's primary key.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnen er en del av tabellens primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column is part of the table's primary key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det er en del av tabellens primærnøkkel. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric column.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet sifre til høyre for desimaltegnet i en numerisk kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point in a numeric column.
trans-unit.target: Antallet sifre til høyre for desimaltegnet i en numerisk kolonne.
